features: Package includes 18 file folders in 6 beautiful muted colors. This is a great way to organize your files and keep them looking stylish. These are perfect for any home, office, or school project!
Mr. Pen file folders are made of thick, high-quality paper. The folders are flexible, durable, and easy to clean - perfect for everyday use.
Our file folders are a great way to store letter-size paper documents and business cards. The folders measure 9.5" by 11.5", which is the standard size for letters.
Keep organized and effortlessly identify your documents with a 1/3-cut tab system in three distinct positions. Simply add custom labels to locate anything you need quickly!

Mr. Pen file folder is an excellent solution for staying on top of your notes. Not only do they provide a great way to keep documents organized, but you can also color code them to make finding what you need in the future much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for filing materials related to women and children.
reviews.reviewText: Folders were used for filing agendas as meetings for a full calendar year from various club committees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the product is excellent. Price is just great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality--Love the Colors!
reviews.reviewText: I am first to admit I get tired of the drab colors of office supplies so I love to change things up, and these folders do that nicely! I was initially impressed with the packaging and a handwritten "thank you" for my order, but then I was pleasantly surprised that they are heavy stock like any high-quality brand of folder. I know I will enjoy these for years. That said, I'm taking a star away because while sturdy, the tab and top of the folder is not reinforced as some are; I think it adds durability and life to a folder. Also, they have white interiors and white tabs, and I wish it was colored throughout--if you're looking through files and you know you're looking for a green folder, the white tab doesn't help. It may just be a matter of preference. But even at that, I would definitely buy these again because of the exterior color and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, love these folders. I actually had to look up the material because they are so thick and glossy, I thought they were plastic, but the listing says that they are made from paper. They are very durable and much nicer than standard manila folders. These are 1/3 cut folders. There are six different colors, three of each color, for 18 folders total. Each color has a different tab style, so for example, all the pink folders are center tabs, all the blue folders are left tabs, etc. The other thing I love is that the colors and tabs are in rainbow order. So you can line up all the color in order and the tabs are also lined up. I like me colors to be in rainbow order. I'm obsessive about it. I actually took my boss' excel sheet once and re-ordered the highlights so they would be in the correct order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The're File Folders, but Good Ones
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say; they are file folders, after all. Are they better than common manila filed folders? Yes, they are a bit thicker and should be durable. I am a 74-year-old artist, and the little kid in me loves the colors. To me, that is the big selling point. When I open my filing cabinet and see the colors, it gives me a bit of extra joy on an otherwise manila day. If one is a buttoned-down manila person, stick with manila folders. Otherwise, add a little fun to your life and get these! The manufacturer's photos and description are accurate, so there is no need to repeat them here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and Durable
reviews.reviewText: These 18 colorful quality file folders are perfect for my office and personal needs. Three features stand out. 1 - They are thicker and more durable than the average folders I have bought and used for years. Because of their durability they won't easily wear out. 2 - Each folder can be kept and used several times for additional purposes. They are made to last. 3 - There are six tasteful colors in each pack. (The inside of each folder including the tab on the upper right is clear white.) You can use a different color for different file categories. I am using them for my volunteer work as well as for my part time business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and flexible
reviews.reviewText: I can always use new file folders and these are neat! These letter sized folders came in a pack of eighteen, There were six colors: pastel yellow, pink, blue, lavender, orange and green, and three files of each color. The color coding makes sorting and organizing files easier. Just a quick look and I locate the file that I want. The folders themselves appear to be made of a laminated, heavyweight paper. They're sturdy yet very flexible. The 1/3 cut tabs are large enough for file labels. I don't anticipate any problem with these folders ripping, tearing or getting "dog eared tabs". I consider these a very good product at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the OCD artist.
reviews.reviewText: I'm an office supply junkie and these are my new favorites. The folders themselves are far sturdier than your average manila folder, and the pastels really brighten up office space. The price is right too - a 100% win!
